SELECT C.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME , C.CLASS_TEACHER , C.STUDENT_MAXNO , C.CLASS_DETAIL , C.PRICE , TO_CHAR(C.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "START_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "END_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_REGIST CR WHERE CR.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO) AS CURRENT_STUDENT , C.STATUS
FROM CLASS C ORDER BY C.CLASS_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS (CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TEACHER, STUDENT_MAXNO, CLASS_DETAIL, PRICE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_DATE, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_CLASS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{className}, #{classTeacher}, #{studentMaxNo}, #{classDetail}, #{price}, TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE, 'Y')

INSERT INTO CLASS_IMG (CLASS_IMG_NO, CLASS_IMG_PATH, CLASS_IMG_ORIGIN, CLASS_IMG_CHANGE, CLASS_IMG_TYPE, STATUS, REF_CNO) VALUES (SEQ_CLASSIMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{classImgPath}, #{classImgOrigin}, #{classImgChange}, #{imgType}, 'Y', SEQ_CLASS_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_NAME , C.CLASS_TEACHER , C.STUDENT_MAXNO , C.CLASS_DETAIL , C.PRICE , TO_CHAR(C.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "START_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "END_TIME" , TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , CIMG.CLASS_IMG_PATH AS THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_IMG CIMG ON C.CLASS_NO = CIMG.REF_CNO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{ocno} AND C.STATUS = 'Y' AND CIMG.CLASS_IMG_TYPE = 1
SELECT * FROM CLASS_IMG WHERE REF_CNO = #{ocno} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND CLASS_IMG_TYPE = 2

SELECT CR.REGIST_NO , CR.REGIST_PAYCODE , CR.REGIST_PRICE , CR.REGIST_PERSON_NO ,TO_CHAR(CR.REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REGIST_DATE" ,TO_CHAR(CR.REGIST_CANCEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REGIST_CANCEL_DATE" ,CR.STATUS , M.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NO, C.CLASS_NAME AS CLASS_NO FROM CLASS_REGIST CR JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = CR.MEM_NO) JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = CR.CLASS_NO)
